title: Dark Mode Theme
description: Add a dark mode toggle to the application for better user experience during night time usage. This would help reduce eye strain and improve accessibility for users who prefer darker themes.

title: Export Data Feature
description: Allow users to export their data in various formats (CSV, JSON, PDF) for external analysis and backup purposes. This would be particularly useful for enterprise customers who need to integrate with other systems.

title: Mobile App Performance
description: The mobile app is running slower than expected, especially when loading large datasets. This impacts user experience and needs optimization for better performance on mobile devices.

title: Slack Integration
description: Integrate with Slack to send notifications about important updates, new features, and system alerts directly to team channels. This would improve communication and keep teams informed.

title: Advanced Search Filters
description: Add more sophisticated search and filtering options to help users find specific content faster. Include date ranges, tags, categories, and custom field filters.

title: Two-Factor Authentication
description: Implement 2FA for enhanced security. Support for authenticator apps and SMS-based verification would greatly improve account security for all users.

title: Dashboard Customization
description: Allow users to customize their dashboard layout by rearranging widgets, adding/removing components, and creating personalized views based on their workflow needs.

title: API Rate Limiting Issues
description: Some API endpoints are hitting rate limits too quickly, causing applications to fail. Need to either increase limits or implement better caching strategies.

title: Email Notification Settings
description: More granular control over email notifications. Users should be able to choose exactly what types of notifications they receive and how frequently.

title: Bulk Operations
description: Add ability to perform bulk operations on multiple items at once - delete, update status, assign tags, etc. This would save significant time for power users.
